IF OBJECT_ID('[dbo].[VW_LibroVacacionesConsolidado]') IS NOT NULL BEGIN DROP VIEW [dbo].[VW_LibroVacacionesConsolidado] END GO
--===================================================================================== -- Author: Laura Katherine Estrada Arango -- Create date: 05-01-2020 -- Description: Vista para obtener la informaciÃ³n de libro de vacaciones --=====================================================================================
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[VW_LibroVacacionesConsolidado] AS SELECT DISTINCT (f.Id), f.NumeroDocumento, CONCAT(f.PrimerNombre, ' ', f.PrimerApellido) AS Nombre, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dbo.LibroVacaciones li INNER JOIN dbo.Contrato c ON li.ContratoId = c.Id INNER JOIN dbo.Funcionario f ON c.FuncionarioId = f.Id WHERE c.FuncionarioId = co.FuncionarioId AND li.Tipo = (SELECT vctlv.CAUSADO FROM util.VW_ConstanteTipoLibroVacaciones vctlv) ) AS PeriodosPendientes, (SELECT SUM(li.DiasCausados) FROM dbo.LibroVacaciones li INNER JOIN dbo.Contrato c ON li.ContratoId = c.Id INNER JOIN dbo.Funcionario f ON c.FuncionarioId = f.Id WHERE c.FuncionarioId = co.FuncionarioId AND li.Tipo = (SELECT vctlv.CAUSADO FROM util.VW_ConstanteTipoLibroVacaciones vctlv) AND li.DiasCausados != 0 ) AS DiasPendientes FROM dbo.LibroVacaciones lv INNER JOIN dbo.Contrato co ON lv.ContratoId = co.Id INNER JOIN dbo.Funcionario f ON co.FuncionarioId = f.Id WHERE lv.Tipo = (SELECT vctlv.CAUSADO FROM util.VW_ConstanteTipoLibroVacaciones vctlv) AND lv.DiasCausados != 0; GO
